org.apache.ctakes.dictionary.lookup.ae

Class UmlsToSnomedDbConsumerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.dictionary.lookup.ae.BaseLookupConsumerImpl
      • org.apache.ctakes.dictionary.lookup.ae.UmlsToSnomedConsumerImpl
        • org.apache.ctakes.dictionary.lookup.ae.UmlsToSnomedDbConsumerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LookupConsumer

    public class UmlsToSnomedDbConsumerImpl
extends UmlsToSnomedConsumerImpl
    Implementation that takes UMLS dictionary lookup hits and stores as NamedEntity objects only the ones that have a SNOMED synonym, by looking in a database for SNOMED codes that map to the identified CUI.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.ctakes.dictionary.lookup.ae.BaseLookupConsumerImpl
